languages.text: "Ты забываешься, {name}!" {n}Если бы взгляд Сороритас мог испепелять, вы бы уже обратились горсткой золы.{/n} "Никто не смеет хулить святую веру — даже Вольный Торговец!"
"You forget yourself, {name}!" {n}If Argenta's glare could burn, you would be a handful of ash by now.{/n} "Not even a Rogue Trader is allowed to blaspheme against the holy faith!"
languages.original_text: "Ты забываешься, {name}!" {n}Если бы взгляд Сороритас мог испепелять, вы бы уже обратились горсткой золы.{/n} "Никто не смеет хулить святую веру — даже Вольный Торговец!"

traits.locale_text: "You are forgetting yourself, {name}!" {n}If Argenta's glare could burn, you would be a handful of ash by now.{/n} "Not even the Rogue Trader is allowed to blaspheme against the holy faith!"

languages.text: «¡Alto ahí, {name}!». {n}Si la mirada de Argenta quemara, ya serías un montón de ceniza.{/n} «¡Ni siquiera un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente puede blasfemar contra la santa fe!».
languages.original_text: "You forget yourself, {name}!" {n}If Argenta's glare could burn, you would be a handful of ash by now.{/n} "Not even a Rogue Trader is allowed to blaspheme against the holy faith!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Alto ahí, {name}!». {n}Si la mirada de Argenta quemara, ya serías un montón de ceniza.{/n} «¡Ni siquiera un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente puede blasfemar contra la santa fe!».

languages.text: 「自分自身を忘れています、{name}！{n}もしアルジェンタの睨みが燃えるのなら、今ごろあなたは一握りの灰になっているでしょう。 {/n}自由開拓者でさえ、聖なる信仰を冒涜することは許されません！」
languages.original_text: "You forget yourself, {name}!" {n}If Argenta's glare could burn, you would be a handful of ash by now.{/n} "Not even a Rogue Trader is allowed to blaspheme against the holy faith!"

traits.locale_text: 「自分自身を忘れています、{name}！{n}もしアルジェンタの睨みが燃えるのなら、今ごろあなたは一握りの灰になっているでしょう。 {/n}自由開拓者でさえ、聖なる信仰を冒涜することは許されません！」

languages.text: “你太得意忘形了，{name}！”{n}如果阿洁塔的眼神可以喷出火焰的话，你恐怕早就灰飞烟灭了。{/n}“即便是行商浪人，也无权亵渎神圣的信仰！”
languages.original_text: "You forget yourself, {name}!" {n}If Argenta's glare could burn, you would be a handful of ash by now.{/n} "Not even a Rogue Trader is allowed to blaspheme against the holy faith!"

traits.locale_text: “你太得意忘形了，{name}！”{n}如果阿洁塔的眼神可以喷出火焰的话，你恐怕早就灰飞烟灭了。{/n}“即便是行商浪人，也无权亵渎神圣的信仰！”

languages.text: "Ihr vergesst Euch, {name}!" {n}Würde Argentas Blick brennen, wärst du jetzt eine Handvoll Asche.{/n} "Nicht einmal Freihändler dürfen blasphemisch gegen den heiligen Glauben handeln!"
languages.original_text: "You forget yourself, {name}!" {n}If Argenta's glare could burn, you would be a handful of ash by now.{/n} "Not even a Rogue Trader is allowed to blaspheme against the holy faith!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr vergesst Euch, {name}!" {n}Würde Argentas Blick brennen, wärst du jetzt eine Handvoll Asche.{/n} "Nicht einmal Freihändler dürfen blasphemisch gegen den heiligen Glauben handeln!"

languages.text: « Vous vous oubliez, {name} ! {n}Si Argenta pouvait vous brûler à la flamme de son seul regard, à l'heure qu'il est, vous ne seriez plus qu'un petit tas de cendres.{/n} Pas même {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} n'est en droit de blasphémer contre notre sacro-sainte religion ! »
languages.original_text: "You forget yourself, {name}!" {n}If Argenta's glare could burn, you would be a handful of ash by now.{/n} "Not even a Rogue Trader is allowed to blaspheme against the holy faith!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous oubliez, {name} ! {n}Si Argenta pouvait vous brûler à la flamme de son seul regard, à l'heure qu'il est, vous ne seriez plus qu'un petit tas de cendres.{/n} Pas même {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} n'est en droit de blasphémer contre notre sacro-sainte religion ! »

languages.text: "Haddini aşıyorsun {name}!" {n}Argenta'nın bakışları yakabilseydi şu an bir avuç küle dönüşmüştün.{/n} "Bir Hür Tacir'in bile kutsal inanca dil uzatma hakkı yoktur!"
languages.original_text: "You forget yourself, {name}!" {n}If Argenta's glare could burn, you would be a handful of ash by now.{/n} "Not even a Rogue Trader is allowed to blaspheme against the holy faith!"
